title: New iOS app, CycleStats, helps track and analyze your Peloton workouts
content:
The Peloton Bike does a great job of tracking your workout metrics after each ride. While these metrics are all viewable under your profile, it has not been organized well to allow members to easily analyze and track their progress. Released today, a new iOS app called CycleStats seeks to solve this problem, both with […]

The post New iOS app, CycleStats, helps track and analyze your Peloton workouts appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new iOS app called CycleStats seeks to provide Peloton members with better visualized training data and more comprehensive analytics tools.
